page.title: 16GENERAL DESCRIPTION OF AREA
page.content: The area is fairly level and ranges from 38 to 43 metres above sea level.There are no factories or other factors to cause air pollution. A main feature of this area is a recently constructed by-pass which has allowed the old A.3 passing through Waterlooville to become a Pedestrian Precinct. This was officially opened by the Mayor of Havant on 4th May 1985. The majority of the area surveyed is open countryside where beef cattle,pigs,sheep and horses comprise the livestock. However a densely populated block(the Berg Estate)does exist and this consists of detached, semi-detatched and flat dwellings. A breakdown would indicate that 14% is woodland,18% residential, 62% open land and 6% industry.
